entries.recommendationDescription:
Check if the Provider and Consumer EPGs are required to communicate with each other using the listed contracts.
  • If connectivity is required, change the contract scope to allow communication between the EPGs.The possible contract scopes are AppProfile, VRF, Tenant, or Global.
  • If connectivity is not required, remove the consumer (not provider) side of the contract relationship.
entries.recommendationTitle: Provider EPG Has No Scope Matching Consumers

example.telemetryStatusDescription: Some switches are streaming telemetry data

get.summary: Telemetry status overview of a fabric.

example.flowTelemetryConfiguration:
configure terminal
ip access-list telemetryipv4acl
  statistics per-entry
  33 permit ip 50.0.0.0/8 201.0.0.0/8
  30 permit ip 50.0.0.0/8 50.0.0.0/8
  32 permit ip 201.0.0.0/8 50.0.0.0/8
ipv6 access-list telemetryipv6acl
  statistics per-entry
  31 permit ipv6 50::/32 50::/32

feature analytics
flow filter telemetryFP
  ipv4 telemetryipv4acl
  ipv6 telemetryipv6acl
flow exporter telemetryExp_0
  destination 199.2.1.244 
  transport udp 5640
  source loopback0
  dscp 44
flow exporter telemetryExp_1
  destination 199.2.1.245 
  transport udp 5640
  source loopback0
  dscp 44
flow exporter telemetryExp_2
  destination 199.2.1.249 
  transport udp 5640
  source loopback0
  dscp 44
flow record telemetryRec
  match ip source address
  match ip destination address
  match ip protocol
  match transport source-port
  match transport destination-port
  collect counter bytes
  collect counter packets
flow monitor telemetryMon
  record telemetryRec
  exporter-bucket-id 1 0 1365
    exporter telemetryExp_0
  exporter-bucket-id 2 1366 2730
    exporter telemetryExp_1
  exporter-bucket-id 3 2731 4095
    exporter telemetryExp_2
flow profile telemetryProf
  collect interval 1000
  source port 787

flow system config
  exporter-id 7
  monitor telemetryMon input
  profile telemetryProf
  
  filter telemetryFP
end
example.softwareConfiguration:
configure terminal
feature lldp
feature icam
feature telemetry
telemetry
  destination-profile
    use-vrf default
    source-interface loopback0
  destination-group 500
    ip address 199.2.1.248 port 57500 protocol gRPC encoding GPB
  sensor-group 520
    data-source DME
    path sys/pim depth unbounded
  sensor-group 527
    data-source DME
    path sys/intf query-condition query-target=subtree

validationResults.ruleFailureMessage: Following devices do not have space in the bootflash folder to download the image: 112
validationResults.ruleRecommendedAction: Remove unnecessary files from the bootflash folder on the listed switch devices so that the devices can download the target firmware image from APICs. You can SSH to the listed devices and use ls -l /bootflash to check the existing files, then rm /bootflash/filename to remove unnecessary files. Make sure that you delete files you know that are unnecessary such as unused switch firmware images.
